author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-654: Introduced exclusiveRead option to camel-ftp. This option is default and fixes the problem that the ftp producer can poll files that is in progress of being written. With this option the ftp producer will wait until the file is finished written and that it can poll it safely. Beware the option is default.
